name: DELUSION QUEST: A CITY TO DIE FOR
name_original: DELUSION QUEST: A CITY TO DIE FOR
description:
---This game is currently in development and in French, it will be translated in a few days and updated later--- 

An old legend says that if you sleep in a train past midnight, you'll travel in another world... well, it seems it was not just a legend.. .
You'll have to defeat the magician who has created this curse to return to your world.. .

Welcome in our city fellow traveler, now pay your ticket please.


~This game was made for a 24 hours writing jam with friends~
